cause.description:
Hello! I'm Vikki, founder of the 'For the love of Andrew Lloyd Webber' cause. I am a huge fan of him and his works. You might not have heard of him, but it's more than likely you've heard of some of his works. A few of his best known are: Cats, Joseph and the Technicolor Dream Coat, Starlight Express and The Phantom of the Opera. You can check out his website at www.andrewlloydwebber.com and don't forget to sign up for the e-newsletter! So, join our cause to inform people about the brilliant Andrew Lloyd Webber and his masterpieces. Also, help keep the spirit of theatre plays alive!
1. Inform people about Andrew Lloyd Webber
2. Inform people about his plays
3. Sign up at www.andrewlloydwebber.com
4. Keep the spirit of the theatre alive!
cause.mission: To inform people about Andrew Lloyd Webber and his works.
cause.name: For the love of Andrew Lloyd Webber
